label: Behavior 62063987
summary: Vessel behavior pattern: navigating along a fixed route (the persistent alignment between COG and heading, combined with stable speed and negligible course deviation, indicates the vessel is following a straight, predefined maritime route; the position progression follows a linear trajectory moving south-southeast, approximated by the parametric equations: lat(t) ≈ 56.388915 - 0.00042 × t, lon(t) ≈ 16.859052 - 0.00024 × t, where t is normalized time index from 0 to 1 over the observed segment)
